column4: Hi, does anyone know why for IPHONE, in 10.10 i can only view the photos, but in 11.04 i can mount as root and get full acess to everything including music?? What am i missing in 10.10 (im still using 10.10 for a few reasons)
but are there any specific packages i can bring to 10.10 to make it work
I dont know offhand, I looked into this because I noticed the same but I hate the bloat 11.04. Cant pin it down to a simple package myself yet though
yeah for a few reaons, mainly compiz, i cannot use 11.04, its just too much of a pain :\
i noticed that in 11.04 there is libimobiledevice2, and in 10.10 theres libimobiledevice1
so i assumed thats the difference
linux is filled with things that work and dont work, tempting you to resort back to windows. I have to for my ipodtouch.
right, i use virtualbox xp for iphone, but now with 11.04 everything iphone was working great
from the package page, it seems that libmobiledevice is the source, but can 10.10 repositories give you 2
ive been trying to get libimobiledevice2 on 10.10 but no luck yet
but what does dist upgrade do
sudo apt-get dist-upgrade, wont that make it 11.04
Hey, i think that worked actually.. waoh
actually i did see that distupgrade thing before, but it was scary :O
I could see why. Everytime I open the updat manager and see the upgrade button i cower
